COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies Policy
COOKIES.SECTION1_TEXT: Currently, Digital Veltrix does not use cookies on its website.
COOKIES.SECTION2_TEXT: If cookies are implemented in the future, users will be notified and their consent will be requested.
COOKIES.SECTION3_TEXT: Users will be able to manage cookies from their browser settings.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.SECTION1_TEXT: We collect personal data such as name, email, and message when you contact us through the form.
PRIVACY.SECTION2_TEXT: We use your data solely to respond to your requests and improve our services.
PRIVACY.SECTION3_TEXT: Data is stored on secure servers on AWS. We are evaluating a migration to Firebase to improve efficiency.
PRIVACY.SECTION4_TEXT: We use Gmail services through Spring Boot to respond to your messages.
PRIVACY.SECTION5_TEXT: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time.
PRIVACY.SECTION6_TEXT: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: Who are we?
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_1: At Digital-Veltrix, we are more than a team: we are two creative minds with a shared vision. As Systems Engineering students, we are passionate about technology, innovation, and developing digital solutions that generate real impact.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_2: Our story began with a curiosity to understand the digital world. Today, that curiosity has turned into real projects where design, logic, and a user-centered approach converge. Every line of code we write seeks to solve concrete problems and add value.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_3: We believe that technology should be functional and accessible. That's why we work with commitment, creativity, and a mindset of continuous improvement, exceeding expectations and building inspiring solutions.
ABOUT_US.SPECIALIZATION: We specialize in the design, development, and implementation of custom software. Our goal is to help companies and entrepreneurs optimize their processes, strengthen their digital presence, and successfully face current technological challenges.
ABOUT_US.MEMBER_JDG_DESC: Back-end developer passionate about technology and efficiency. I handle tools like Java, Python, and TypeScript. I am characterized by my technical focus, constant learning, and collaborative spirit.
ABOUT_US.MEMBER_JPCR_DESC: Full Stack developer with a focus on Front-end and Back-end. I am excited to create functional, scalable, and visually appealing solutions. Experienced in JSF, HTML, XHTML, Angular, Java, and TypeScript.

CTA_FINAL.TITLE: Ready to transform your idea into software?
CTA_FINAL.SUBTITLE: Let's talk and design a custom digital solution for you with Digital-Veltrix.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Is it complicated to request a custom system?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: No, we guide you step by step to define what you need.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How long does it take to develop a custom solution?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: It depends on the project, but we always give you a clear estimate from the start.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Can I request a system even if I have no technical knowledge?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Of course! We translate your ideas into functional solutions.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Do you offer advice to define project requirements?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, we help you structure your needs into a technical plan.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What kind of companies or people can hire your services?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We work with entrepreneurs, small businesses, and anyone with a digital idea.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Do the systems you develop work on mobile devices?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, all our developments are responsive and adaptable.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Can I request only the design or also the full development?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We offer both services, together or separately.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Do you offer maintenance or support after delivering the project?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, we provide technical support and updates if needed.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Can I see examples of previous projects?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Sure, we have a selection of featured projects we've completed.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How can I contact you?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Through the contact form or by email.
